## Public Member Functions

### applyPreexistingWaitcnt() {#a83153660927a017cef8d173e5917f3a4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool WaitcntGeneratorPreGFX12::applyPreexistingWaitcnt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siinsertwaitcnts-cpp-/waitcntbrackets">WaitcntBrackets</a> &amp; ScoreBrackets, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; OldWaitcntInstr, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/amdgpu/waitcnt">AMDGPU::Waitcnt</a> &amp; Wait, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab6395548cae73865213e279ae461db54">MachineBasicBlock::instr&#95;iterator</a> It) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Combine consecutive S&#95;WAITCNT and S&#95;WAITCNT&#95;VSCNT instructions that precede <code>It</code> and follow <code>OldWaitcntInstr</code> and apply any extra waits from <code>Wait</code> that were added by previous passes.

Currently this pass conservatively assumes that these preexisting waits are required for correctness.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp/#l00529">529</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siinsertwaitcnts-cpp">SIInsertWaitcnts.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
